translations: v．为他人代笔：指为他人撰写文章、书籍等，但不署名，通常是为了金钱报酬。
· He ghostwrote the autobiography of a famous actor.
他为一位著名演员的自传代笔。

sentences.sentence: "I used to get fan letters from prisoners, too," David said. "Back when I ghostwrote that column for Hustler."
sentences.translation: 大卫紧接着说：“我过去也常常收到来自监狱的信，那时我还在为哈叟代写专栏呢。”

sentences.sentence: Chevron claimed its adversaries falsified evidence, intimidated judges, and even ghostwrote parts of the judicial opinion underlying the multibillion-dollar award.
sentences.translation: 雪佛龙声称对手伪造证据，恐吓法官，甚至雇人撰写做出上百亿美元裁决理由的部分司法意见。
